summary: Next.js bundling fails with a critical dependency error when importing the Temporal client in server-side code. The error originates from data-converter-helpers.js which uses a dynamic require expression that bundlers cannot statically analyze.
userImpact: Developers cannot use @temporalio/client in Next.js server-side code without bundler errors, blocking legitimate use cases for signaling workflows.
rootCause: The data-converter-helpers.js file uses dynamic require expressions that bundlers like webpack (used by Next.js) cannot statically analyze, triggering critical dependency warnings/errors during build time.
proposedFix: Implement #1458 to address bundler compatibility, though the commenter suggests this alone may not fully resolve the issue.
keyQuote: Critical dependency: the request of a dependency is an expression
